main event: A radar operator at Hill AFB observed an unidentified aerial object maintaining a high altitude and performing evasive maneuvers.
interesting points: The object was silver in color and descended from 55,000 feet to 20,000 feet,The radar scope showed no communications could be established with the object,The object maneuvered rapidly and flew directly over Hill AFB,Time on the radar indicated the object had a ground speed estimated between 200 to 500 knots,The sighting was part of a declassified Project Blue Book document.
